## mtcars

We looked at the mtcars dataset. Focusing on miles per gallon and automatic transmission

## mpg

Miles per gallon are right-skewed and the mean is `r mean(mtcars$mpg,na.rm=TRUE)` and a standard error of `r std.error(mtcars$mpg)`

```{r}

hist(mtcars$mpg,breaks=10)

```


```{r}

library(ggplot2)

data(mtcars)

ggplot(mtcars,aes(factor(am),mpg)) + geom_boxplot()

```
